ComicInfo.Summary:
As Swamp Thing continues his journey across space, he arrives at the plant world J586. The plant life here are already sentient, and Swamp Thing unknowingly merges with them. Green Lantern Medphyll of Sector 586 eventually finds a solution, sending Swamp Thing on his way.
Meanwhile, Adam Strange finally delivers his message from Swamp Thing to Abby, but her reaction is hysterical and of disbelief.
Includes 2 pinups, the first by Bill Sienkiewicz and the second by Walt Simonson.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-19 06:52:21. [Issue ID 28188]

ComicInfo.Title: All Flesh Is Grass
